page.title: 06A Local Amenity
page.content: {Attitudes}to the{B.M.X.Track The B.M.X. track is dangerous because when you go over the jumps you skid on the gravel and sometimes you go to hospital with nasty side effects. My friend Christopher came off his bike and he had to go to hospital.He had two stitches in his right arm. The jumps on the track are good because you can have races against each other.It is{dangerous}when you turn into each other. by Darren Walsh. note:The nearby{woods}have been turned into a bicycle track as children were riding their popular stunt bikes on the streets.Some believe that the ground wil be eroded and are unhappy about the scheme,others want the track to keep children off the streets.
